About Me

My Name is Brianna Duncan and I'm from Cambridge Massachusetts. I currently reside in Las Vegas, Nevada. I graduated from the University of Oregon Go Ducks! I ran track and field there and after my career I decided to walk away from track. I made the career change from a pro track athlete to software engineer. I am self taught and the skills I have learned from my sport gave me the motivation I needed I am a Front-End Engineer who has been studying Web Development for 2 years.
